stimulusHtml: A block of mass m is initially moving on rough surface inclined at angle Î¸ above the horizontal, as shown in Figure 1. Figure 2 shows the four forces acting on the block. Which of the following best describes the motion of the block at the moment shown in the two figures?
choicesHtml: The block is moving up the incline and speeding up.
The block is moving up the incline and slowing down.
The block is moving down the incline and speeding up.
The block is moving down the incline at a constant speed.
The block is moving down the incline and slowing down.
